dmca.title: P2P Company Wants Alleged Infringers Removed from Google
dmca.body:
Lott & Friedland
PROFESSIONAL ASSOCIATION
July 15, 2004

Google, Inc	
Via Federal Express
Attn: Customer Support, Copyright Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, California 94043

Re: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Our File No. 06071-6030

Dear Sirs;

We are intellectual property counsel to Free Peers, Inc ("Free Peers"). 

Free Peer's hereby places you on notice that:

1.	Free Peers is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the BearShare software, the bearshare.com website and the text, artwork, logos, and photographs appearing therein (singly and collectively, the "BearShare Material"); and

2.	Utilizing the search query, "bearshare," at www.google.com, the following search results and sponsored links ("the Infringing Material") provide direct access to unauthorized copies of the BearShare Material or unauthorized derivative works of the BearShare Material which infringe the BearShare Material and exclusive rights of Free Peers:

a. www.mp3downloadhq.com
b. http://download.com.com/3000-2166-10051706.html. 
c. http//www.downloadlab.com/texis/open/downloads1?eng=google
d. www.bearshare.de
e. www.pcworld.com/downloads/file_description/0.fid.8062.00.asp
f. www.bearshare.it
g. www.zdnet.fr/telecharger/windows/fiche/0.39021313.11007208s.00.htm
h. www.bolton-heaton.freeserve.co.uk/bearhare.htm
i. www.softpedia.com/public/cat/10/6/10-6-4.shtml
j. www.tileforurn.betanews.com/download.php?ftd=977585791
k. www.excite.it/download/files/BearShare=beta/1647
l. www.megagames.com/news/html/mp3/bearshare.shtml
m. www.comfm.com/download/?log=12
n. www.smartdownloads.net/download-71.html
o. www.bestdownload.com/view.php?detail=650
p. www.50download.coml21727 download-BearShare-Pro.htm
q. www.winload.de/download/29526/Intemet/File.Sharing/BearShare-4.4.1.html
r. http://superdownloads.ubbi.com.br/download/i7801.html
s. www.mp3machine.com/software/BearShare/
t. www.tucows.com/preview/302809.html
u. www.soft32.com/download_291.html

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the Infringing Material.

I have good faith belief that the Infringing Material is not authorized by Free Peers, its agents or the law. The information in the Notice of Copyright Infringement is accurate and I am authorized to act on behalf of Free Peers.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address, telephone number, or email address indicated below:

Lott & Friedland, PA
[private]
[private]
Coral Gables, Florida 33134 
Tel: (xxx) xxx-xxxx
Email: [private]@[private].com
Very truly yours,

LOTT & FRIEDLAND 
By: [private]

OF/nav
cc: Free Peers, Inc.
